hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(*) as DT from TB_CLASSE WHERE FL_CANC='N'
select count(*) as DT from TB_AUTORE WHERE FL_CANC='N'
select count(*) as DT from TB_TITOLO WHERE FL_CANC='N'

SELECT count(*) as DT FROM TR_Tit_Cla, TB_Classe WHERE TR_TIT_CLA.CD_SISTEMA = TB_CLASSE.CD_SISTEMA AND TR_TIT_CLA.CD_EDIZIONE = TB_CLASSE.CD_EDIZIONE AND TR_TIT_CLA.CLASSE = TB_CLASSE.CLASSE AND TR_TIT_CLA.FL_CANC <> 'S' AND TB_CLASSE.FL_CANC <> 'S'

SELECT count(*) as DT FROM TR_Tit_Cla, TB_Classe WHERE TR_Tit_Cla.BID = :BID AND TR_TIT_CLA.CD_SISTEMA = TB_CLASSE.CD_SISTEMA AND TR_TIT_CLA.CD_EDIZIONE = TB_CLASSE.CD_EDIZIONE AND TR_TIT_CLA.CLASSE = TB_CLASSE.CLASSE AND TR_TIT_CLA.FL_CANC <> 'S' AND TB_CLASSE.FL_CANC <> 'S'

SELECT TR_Tit_Aut.BID, TR_Tit_Aut.tp_responsabilita, TR_Tit_Aut.cd_relazione, TR_Tit_Aut.nota_tit_aut, TR_Tit_Aut.fl_incerto, TR_Tit_Aut.fl_superfluo, TR_Tit_Aut.cd_strumento_mus, TB_Autore.VID, TB_Autore.ISADN, TB_Autore.tp_forma_aut, TB_Autore.ky_cautun, TB_Autore.ky_auteur, TB_Autore.ky_el1_a, TB_Autore.ky_el1_b, TB_Autore.ky_el2_a, TB_Autore.ky_el2_b, TB_Autore.tp_nome_aut, TB_Autore.ky_el3, TB_Autore.ky_el4, TB_Autore.ky_el5, TB_Autore.ky_cles1_a, TB_Autore.ky_cles2_a, TB_Autore.cd_paese, TB_Autore.cd_lingua, TB_Autore.aa_nascita, TB_Autore.aa_morte, TB_Autore.cd_livello, TB_Autore.fl_speciale, TB_Autore.ds_nome_aut, TB_Autore.cd_agenzia, TB_Autore.cd_norme_cat, TB_Autore.nota_aut, TB_Autore.nota_cat_aut, TB_Autore.VID_Link, TB_Autore.ute_ins, TB_Autore.ts_ins, TB_Autore.ute_var, TB_Autore.ts_var, TB_Autore.ute_forza_ins, TB_Autore.ute_forza_var, TB_Autore.fl_canc FROM TR_Tit_Aut, TB_Autore WHERE TR_TIT_AUT.VID = TB_AUTORE.VID AND TB_AUTORE.VID = :VID AND TR_TIT_AUT.FL_CANC <> 'S' AND TB_AUTORE.FL_CANC <> 'S'

select count(distinct titsog.bid) as numSog from tr_tit_sog_bib titsog inner join tr_tit_bib titbib on titbib.bid=titsog.bid where titsog.fl_canc<>'S' and titbib.fl_canc<>'S' and titbib.fl_possesso='S' and titsog.cid=:cid and titbib.cd_polo=:codPolo and titbib.cd_biblioteca=:codBib
select count(distinct titcla.bid) as numCla from tr_tit_cla titcla where titcla.fl_canc<>'S' and titcla.CD_SISTEMA=:sistema and titcla.CD_EDIZIONE=:edizione and titcla.CLASSE=:simbolo

select count(distinct titcla.bid) as numCla from tr_tit_cla titcla inner join tr_tit_bib titbib on titbib.bid=titcla.bid where titcla.fl_canc<>'S' and titbib.fl_canc<>'S' and titbib.fl_possesso='S' and titbib.cd_polo=:codPolo and titbib.cd_biblioteca=:codBib and titcla.CD_SISTEMA=:sistema and titcla.CD_EDIZIONE=:edizione and titcla.CLASSE=:simbolo

select tit_sog.bid, sogg.cd_sogg, tit_sog.ute_var, max(param.cd_livello) as maxLivAut from tr_tit_sog_bib tit_sog inner join tr_soggettari_biblioteche sogg on sogg.cd_sogg = tit_sog.cd_sogg inner join tbf_utenti_professionali_web userweb on userweb.userid=substring(tit_sog.ute_var,7) inner join tbf_bibliotecario userbib on userbib.id_utente_professionale=userweb.id_utente_professionale inner join tbf_par_auth param on param.id_parametro=userbib.id_parametro where tit_sog.fl_canc<>'S' and sogg.fl_att='1' and param.cd_par_auth='SO' and param.fl_leg_auth='S' and param.fl_abil_legame='S' and tit_sog.bid=:bid and sogg.cd_sogg=:sogg group by 1,2,3 order by 4 desc
SELECT seq_tb_autore.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_isadn_autore.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_titolo.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_E_tb_titolo.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_MUS_tb_titolo.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_MSM_tb_titolo.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_CMP_tb_titolo.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_isadn_autore.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_luogo.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_marca.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_soggetto.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_parola.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_ts_link_multim.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_tim.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_descrittore.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_termine_thesauro.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_personaggio.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_tb_script.nextVal as DT FROM dual
SELECT seq_ts_proposta_marc.nextVal as DT FROM dual
0 = 0 ORDER BY this_.TS_VAR, this_.KY_CLES1_A, NVL(this_.KY_CLES2_A, ' '), this_.TP_NOME_AUT
0 = 0 ORDER BY this_.KY_CAUTUN, this_.KY_AUTEUR, this_.DS_NOME_AUT, this_.VID
0 = 0 GROUP BY this_.CD_PAESE,this_.CD_LINGUA_1 ORDER BY this_.CD_PAESE,this_.CD_LINGUA_1
0 = 0 ORDER BY this_.TS_VAR, this_.KY_CLES1_A, NVL(this_.KY_CLES2_A, ' '), this_.TP_NOME_AUT
0 = 0 ORDER BY this_.TS_VAR, this_.KY_CLES1_A, NVL(this_.KY_CLES2_A, ' '), this_.TP_NOME_AUT
0 = 0 ORDER BY this_.POSIZIONE, this_.CD_SISTEMA, this_.CD_EDIZIONE, this_.CLASSE
0 = 0 ORDER BY this_.TP_LEGAME, this_.CD_NATURA_BASE DESC, this_.SEQUENZA
